Container.Name: Watch Media Server
Container.Overview: Watch Media Server v1.0.0 - A modern, self-hosted media streaming and management platform with advanced features like transcoding, metadata management, user authentication, and real-time scanning with directory feedback.
Container.Description:
Watch Media Server v1.0.0 is a comprehensive media streaming solution that provides:
• **Media Library Management**: Organize and manage your movie and TV show collections • **Advanced Streaming**: High-quality video streaming with adaptive bitrate support • **Transcoding**: On-the-fly video transcoding for optimal playback on any device • **Metadata Integration**: Automatic metadata fetching from TMDB and other sources • **User Authentication**: Secure user management with role-based access control • **Search & Discovery**: Powerful search with filters for genre, year, rating, and more • **Subtitle Support**: Automatic subtitle detection and management • **Mobile Responsive**: Beautiful, responsive web interface that works on all devices • **API Access**: RESTful API for integration with other applications • **Real-time Scanning**: Live scan progress with directory feedback • **Version Display**: Application version and build information • **Enhanced UI**: Movies/TV shows count, scan status, and improved theme toggle • **Docker Ready**: Easy deployment with Docker and Docker Compose • **Refactored Codebase**: Clean, modular architecture for better maintainability
Perfect for home media servers, small offices, or anyone who wants a Netflix-like experience with their own content.
